pages.text: I have spent a lot of time mastering my weapons and defense is sometimes the greatest offense, and sometimes your defense can be your offense.

pages.title: Parrying
pages.text: Mobs getting to close or you want to push an attacker off a cliff, parrying is for you. $(br2)To preform this technique you will first need to crouch and upon approach of the attacker hold your shield up. $(br2)This will knock your attacker back and stun them.

pages.title: Offensive defense
pages.text: Knocking and enemy back and stunning them is great but sometimes you want to give them a good hit. $(br2)Well your in luck after much study I have found the $(thing)barbed enchantment$() which will deal damage to an enemy upon sucessful parry.

pages.title: A light shove
pages.text: Enemies are getting to close for your comfort send them flying with the $(thing)pummeling enchanment$(). $(br2)$(o)also works on annoying friends$()
